description:
Acnologia, also known as The Black Dragon (黒龍, Kokuryuu), and fearsomely reputed as The Black Dragon in the Book of Apocalypse, is a powerful Dragon that appears to be flying around the continent or the world. He seems to have some connection with Zeref; the depths of this relationship are as of yet unknown.
Source: fairytail.wikia.com
name: Acnologia
